name: bb-api
description: Internal API for Bipolar Bridges Project

scripts.db:shell: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker attach bb_data_services_db_shell_1
scripts.db:mock: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute example_0
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down && docker volume rm bb_data_services_store

author: bipolarbridges
